subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte worked seven and a third innings for the win, getting home runs from Jason Giambi and Melky Cabrera to lead the Yankees to their 11th victory in 13 games.
snippet: Andy Pettitte worked seven and a third innings for the win, getting home runs from Jason Giambi and Melky Cabrera to lead the Yankees to their 11th victory in 13 games.
